integrations.name: Paperless-ngx
integrations.description: An open-source document management system that transforms your physical documents into a searchable online archive.
use_cases: Integration with AI agents via REST API to retrieve or store documents

integrations.name: Composio
integrations.description: A platform that provides 850+ toolkits and 11,000+ tools for AI agents, handling complex authentication and connectivity.
use_cases: Connecting agents to Google Calendar, Gmail, Slack, and Outlook
Simplifying OAuth flow for enterprise tools
Hosted MCP endpoints for easy integration

integrations.name: Nylas
integrations.description: A developer-first API platform that simplifies integration with email, calendar, and contacts from 250+ providers.
use_cases: Unified access to Gmail, Outlook, and IMAP
Agent-native email and calendar access via Nylas CLI
Real-time sync and webhooks for communication events

integrations.name: MCP Google Calendar Server
integrations.description: A Model Context Protocol server that gives AI agents direct access to Google Calendar.
use_cases: Checking availability and listing upcoming appointments
Managing multiple calendars via a standardized protocol

integrations.name: MCP Gmail Server
integrations.description: A Model Context Protocol server that enables AI agents to read, search, and send emails via Gmail.
use_cases: Searching through inbox with natural language
Standardized email tool access across frameworks
